sentences.en: As he began to befriend them he took all precautions.
sentences.cn: 开始和那两个姑娘接近时,他采取了一切防备措施.

sentences.en: At first the young man appeared about to befriend me.
sentences.cn: 先是那个年轻人出现在我背后.

sentences.en: Be a friend to thyself , and others will befriend thee.
Befriend your feelings and the inner child who is feeling them.
sentences.cn: 善待你的情感和内心的感受.

sentences.en: God befriend us, as our cause is just.
sentences.cn: 上帝善待我们, 因为我们的宗旨正大.

sentences.en: If we did not know each other, would you still want to befriend me ( Jia ) ?
sentences.cn: 如果我们不认识.你还想和我做朋友 麽?

sentences.en: If you don't care about me, why did you befriend me?
sentences.cn: 如果你不在乎我, 为什么和我做朋友?

sentences.en: If you want to befriend a Libra, try to be kind and fair.
sentences.cn: 假如你想和天秤座的人交朋友, 你自己要努力做到仁慈和公平.

sentences.en: Nicholas was a man who would always befriend me.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉斯是个总是待我如友的人.

sentences.en: Now you're going to befriend that trouble maker?
sentences.cn: 现在你成了这个麻烦精的朋友了?

sentences.en: She is such a lovely girl. Everyone likes befriend with her.
sentences.cn: 她是个善良体贴的女孩, 所有人都喜欢和她做朋友.

sentences.en: The spice of life is to befriend.
They befriend a precious few, and expand their kingdom carefully.
sentences.cn: 他们只有少量珍贵的朋友, 并且对于扩张国土非常谨慎.

sentences.en: They befriend the young girl, providing her with food and shelter.
sentences.cn: 他们热心地照顾这个年轻的姑娘, 给她吃的、给她住处.

sentences.en: They befriended me when I first arrived in London as a student.
sentences.cn: 我初到伦敦求学时，他们待我如同朋友。

sentences.en: When befriended, remember it; when you befriend, forget it.
sentences.cn: 当你被别人善待时, 请记住这一切; 当你善待别人时, 请忘记这一切.

trans.tran_en: to behave in a friendly way towards someone, especially someone who is younger or needs help

trans.tran_cn: 以朋友的方式对待，帮助，照顾
